problem_text_cn: 在Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=10,BC=12,点D为线段BC上一动点．以CD为⊙O直径,作AD交⊙O于点E,连BE,则BE的最小值为()
problem_text_en: In Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, AC = N_1, BC = N_2, point D is a moving point on line segment BC. Taking CD as the diameter of ⊙O, make AD intersect ⊙O at point E, even BE, then the minimum value of BE is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接CE,∴∠CED=∠CEA=90°,∴点E在以AC为直径的⊙Q上,∵AC=10,∴QC=QE=5,当点Q、E、B共线时BE最小,∵BC=12,∴QB=√{BC^{2}+QC^{2}}=13,∴BE=QB-QE=8,故选:B．
